email_opt_in.name: user_id
email_opt_in.description: edX user ID of the learner

email_opt_in.name: email
email_opt_in.description: Email address of the learner in the course whose ID is associated with this record

email_opt_in.name: full_name
email_opt_in.description: The full name of the learner

email_opt_in.name: is_opted_in_for_email
email_opt_in.description: Whether or not the learner has opted to receive marketing emails

email_opt_in.name: preference_set_datetime
email_opt_in.description: The timestamp the status was set

description: Table generated the simeon CLI tool via simeon split --file-type email after download. It contains email opt-in preferences for every user for every course.
